name: Scott F. Smith 0001
content: Dr. Scott Smith Dr. Scott Smith Professor Department of Computer Science The Johns Hopkins University Baltimore, MD 21218-2686 phone: (410) 516-5299 email: scott@cs.jhu.edu office: Malone 219 My research interests span a number of areas in programming languages. The Home Page of the Programming Languages Laboratory details both current and past research activities of myself and students. I teach Object-Oriented Software Engineering (601.421/621) in the fall, and Programming Languages (601.426/626) in the spring. The Programming Languages Seminar runs most of the time, see the lab page for listings.
